quizzes.question: How many statements could be placed between if's braces?
How many nested if statements can an if statement contain?

quizzes.textContent:
[h1]The if else Statement[/h1]

In if/else statements, [b]a single statement[/b] can be included without enclosing it into curly braces. [code format="cpp" codeId="199"]int a = 10;
[b]if [/b](a > 4)
  cout << "Yes";
[b]else[/b]
  cout << "No";[/code]
[note]Including the curly braces anyway is a good practice, as they clarify the code and make it easier to read.[/note]
